fields.summary: Label inside Scrollview is not show after certain amount of characters
fields.environment:
OS X El Capitan 10.11.2
XCode 7.2
iPhone Simulator 6s Plus / iOS 9.2
Ti SDK 5.1.1.GA

comments.body:
Possible workaround: Split the text in multiple labels. 
Having multiple labels with less than 13k characters inside the scrollview does not cause the bug
One note: it appears that the bug is not about character limit, but size of the label. If you have a lower font size, its possible to have more than 13k characters without the label vanishing

Cannot reproduce. I stopped after 28000.
